attributes.action: Make all fly tipping illeagal and to make the fly tippers responible for any clean up not the land owner
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Making the land owner pay for the removal of someone elses rubbish is wrong and should not be allowed. This petition is to bring about a change in law to stop the fly tipping in both the countryside and it the towns and city's, whether redential or common land.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
